title: There shall be Balwadi, Welfare hall and any of two amenities mentioned above
clause_text: There shall be Balwadi, Welfare hall and any of two amenities mentioned above.There shall be health Centre/ outpost, Aaganwadi, skill development centre, women entrepreneurship centre, yuvakendra
section: Aaganwadi, Health Centre / Outpost, Community Hall
